title: RFK Jr. to make money on lawsuits while in Trump administration
shortDescription: The secretary of Health and Human Services nominee wrote in an ethics agreement that he would keep receiving contingency fees.

title: Judge blocks Trump's birthright citizenship executive order
shortDescription: The order has already become the subject of five lawsuits by civil rights groups and Democratic attorneys general from 22 states.

title: Trump's anti-DEI initiatives aimed at 'reverse discrimination'
shortDescription: Many underrepresented people who built successful government careers credited those laws and their enforcement with expanding the path to prosperity.

title: Tech execs attend Trump's inauguration
shortDescription: Elon Musk, Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg and other top tech executives attended Trump's presidential inauguration.

title: Marco Rubio to visit Panama as Donald Trump lashes out at country
shortDescription: Marco Rubio will travel to Panama on his first trip abroad as secretary of State. The visit comes as Donald Trump looks to reclaim Panama's canal.

title: Seattle judge will rule on Trumps birthright EO
shortDescription: A Seattle judge will rule on President Trump's birthright citizenship case brought by Democratic attorneys general from four states.

title: Trump to world leaders: 'America is back and open for business'
shortDescription: The first day of the world leaders' meeting on Monday coincided with the inauguration of Trump's second term.

title: US judge to hear states' bid to block Trump birthright citizenship order
shortDescription: The lawsuit filed in Seattle has been progressing the fastest of the five cases brought over the executive order.

title: President Trump's first interview in office
shortDescription: President Donald Trump sat down for his first interview as the 47th president with Fox News host Sean Hannity.

title: Daily Briefing: Laken Riley Act heads to Donald Trump's desk

title: Trump said he'd end Russia-Ukraine war. It's proving to be tough.
shortDescription: Donald Trump pledged to end the conflict in Ukraine, but the war has proved tough to solve. Now, he says he'll sanction Russia.

title: Environmental justice advocates say Trump's orders ignore reality
shortDescription: Presidents Clinton, Biden issued orders aiming to correct environmental injustice. On Monday, President Trump issued orders revoking those efforts.

title: Trump talks vision, takes shots at foes in 1st interview: 5 takeaways
shortDescription: In a sit-down interview with Fox News, President Trump remained focused on past grievances as much as new goals for his returning administration.

title: Trump picks agent who shielded him from gunfire to lead Secret Service
shortDescription: President Trump picked Sean Curran, one of the agents who shielded him during the Butler, Pa., assassination attempt, to lead the Secret Service.

title: Police officers condemn Trump's January 6 pardons
shortDescription: Lawmakers and police officers criticized Donald Trump's decision to pardon January 6 defendants.

title: Trump pardons D.C. police officers convicted of murder, obstruction
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pardoned two Washington, D.C. police officers Wednesday who were convicted in the death of motorbike rider Karon Hylton-Brown.

title: Congress passes Laken Riley Act targeting immigrants accused of crimes
shortDescription: The bill would require law enforcement to detain immigrants without legal status arrested for crimes including larceny and shoplifting.

title: President Trump's first trip set for North Carolina, California
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will visit storm-ravaged North Carolina on Friday in his first trip outside Washington since the start of his second term.

title: Trump's halt on refugees hits flight arrivals this week
shortDescription: The surprise halt of travel this week scuttled the hopes of last-minute arrivals as Donald Trump's refugee shutdown took hold early.

title: Read what Joe Biden wrote in letter to Donald Trump
shortDescription: Joe Biden told Donald Trump "may God bless you and guide you" in a letter he left in the Resolute Desk of the White House before his exit.

title: Trump threatens tariffs on Russia if Putin won't stop Ukraine war
shortDescription: In a post to Truth Social, President Trump threatened to hit Russia with tariffs if Vladimir Putin refuses to make a deal on the Ukraine war.

title: Who's the 'Camp Auschwitz' Jan. 6 rioter that Trump pardoned?
